title: ðŸš¨Jon Gruden resigns as Raiders coach after more leaked emails reveal racist, homophobic & misogynistic language - Emergency Podcast (Football 10/11)
description:
Jon Gruden is OUT as the Raiders coach and Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech are here to break down the shocking series of events and revelations that led to this. The guys break down more emails that were leaked, leaving Las Vegas with no choice but to part ways with Gruden. We also take a look at the Raiders the rest of the year and who they could target in their coaching search.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
